mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files (post_no, mem_no, files_url) VALUES ( #{post_no:INTEGER}, #{mem_no:INTEGER}, #{files_url:VARCHAR}} )
mapper.delete: UPDATE files SET files_del_check = TRUE WHERE files_no = #{files_no:INTEGER} AND files_del_check = FALSE
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM files WHERE files_no=#{files_no:INTEGER} AND files_del_check=false
